citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00pm on
25-Jul-19.
The licensee was not home but was reached by phone. They were unable to make the inspection as they were over
an hour away. Optimal times and dates were discussed.

narrative:
